dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1966
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Recommends two books on pacifism, visits her daughter in Vermont and then friends in Montreal. Attends the funeral of Jane Marra who started the Catholic Worker in Boston.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 846 1966-12-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
